metadata.interface_mandate: Ensures all runtime constants derived from the Manifest ID are traceable, immutable across the active configuration set, and accessible for high-level validation (L1-L7).

viability_margin_oracle.notes: Controls dynamic computation of the epsilon safety margin based on temporal stability data.

constraint_budget_matrix.notes: Defines static and dynamic resource allocation limits enforced system-wide.

metric_efficacy_contract.notes: Defines the core weighting schema used for synthesizing critical performance metrics (Utility/Risk trade-off).
